# I work on issues related to global health and development, with a focus on education in low and middle-income countries.

::::: {.grid .align-items-start}
::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-7}
### Biography

I’m a Senior Researcher at [Rethink Priorities](https://rethinkpriorities.org) where I support the Global Health and Development team. Previously, I worked at **J-PAL**, the **World Bank**, and the **Canadian Privy Council Office**.

A political scientist by training, my research explores the political economy of development, with a focus on the politics of education. My work has appeared in *World Development*, *Comparative Politics*, and *International Studies Perspectives*. I am also an advocate for open science and an **#rstats** evangelist.
